title: Athletism — Rowing (Elite) — Phase 4: Strength→Power Conversion (RFD & Rate)
goal: Translate force to boat speed; improve rate changes and RFD.

warmup: Technical drills: pick drill / pause @ arms-only / legs-only
main: Boat: 5x6' @22–24 spm with 10'' bursts to 28 spm each min
Plyo: 3x8 MB chest throw + OH throw
cooldown: Light stretching (Posterior chain, lats, hip flexors)

notes: Week 1: Introduce Olympic-derivative power. Week 2: Slight ↑ in rate (22–26 spm) on pieces.
